Name: Inside The Code
About the game: Someone has sneaked in your house during the night and placed a bomb in your basement! Find your way through procedurally generated dungeons and try to survive as long as possible, disarming bombs and fighting your enemies. Find dozens of powerups and items to complete the levels and go deeper in these endless caves.
Meta Title: Inside The Code: Jan 8, 2016, Tinycorp and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Inside The Code? Check out the release date (Jan 8, 2016), developer insights from Tinycorp, and a complete game summary.
